name: Withsand
description:
engulfs the world in darkness.

You have a base, which you can pick up and move around to better collect ore and to protect it from the other survivors. They also have bases. Destroy them.

You can't fire when you are holding ore or your base. When you set your base down, make sure it is out of harm's way. Scorpions and other survivors will try to destroy it if you let your guard down.

You share a health bar with your base.

Further instructions are in game.

Have fun!

Note: The source contains a different id for the highscore system, to prevent score tampering.

Update: Since the compo, the option to close the game with the escape key from any screen has been added. No option to exit the game from the menu existed before.
